content: The following lists events that happened during **1962 in Singapore**. ## Incumbents - [Yang di-Pertuan Negara](/wiki/Yang_di-Pertuan_Negara) – [Yusof Ishak](/wiki/Yusof_Ishak) - [Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister) – [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew) ## Events ### April - 10 April – The [SEACOM](/wiki/SEACOM_(Asian_cable_system)) cable is announced. ### September - 1 September – [A referendum](/wiki/1962_Merger_Referendum_of_Singapore) is held in Singapore to vote on merger with Malaysia. In the end, 70 percent of votes chose merger in accordance with the terms of the 1961 White Paper. ### December - 16 December - [Trolleybus services](/wiki/Trolleybuses_in_Singapore) in Singapore cease operations. ## Births - 6 February – [Eleanor Wong](/wiki/Eleanor_Wong_(playwright)) – Lawyer, playwright. - 28 March – [Alvin Yeo](/wiki/Alvin_Yeo) – Lawyer and former politician (d. 2022) - 29 May – [Fandi Ahmad](/wiki/Fandi_Ahmad) – Former football player. - 14 June – [S. Iswaran](/wiki/S._Iswaran) – [Minister of Transport](/wiki/Ministry_of_Transport_(Singapore)). - 27 October – [Ang Peng Siong](/wiki/Ang_Peng_Siong) – Former swimmer. - [Olivia Lum](/wiki/Olivia_Lum) – [Hyflux](/wiki/Hyflux) CEO. - [Jennifer Tham](/wiki/Jennifer_Tham) – Conductor of Singapore Youth Choir. - [K. F. Seetoh](/wiki/K._F._Seetoh) – Food personality, creator of Makansutra. - [Madeleine Lee](/wiki/Madeleine_Lee_(writer)) – Investment manager, poet. - [Charis Eng](/wiki/Charis_Eng) - Clinical geneticist (d. 2024) ## Deaths - 21 August – [Ahmad Ibrahim](/wiki/Ahmad_Ibrahim_(Singaporean_politician)), [Member of Parliament](/wiki/Member_of_Parliament) (b. 1927). This Singapore-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: 1962 in Singapore
